src:
Muller Didesak Pindah ke Manchester United oleh Legenda Bayern Munchen
04 Nov 2019, 05:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Legenda Bayern Munchen, Bastian Schweinsteiger, nampak prihatin dengan situasi Thomas Muller saat ini. Oleh karena itu, ia minta pemain Die Bavarians itu untuk meninggalkan Allianz Arena dan memenuhi pinangan Manchester United.
Dalam beberapa pekan terakhir, Muller kerap diberitakan akan pindah ke Manchester United. Terutama setelah dirinya dilupakan mantan pelatih Bayern Munchen, Niko Kovac, dalam beberapa kesempatan di musim ini.
Memang, pemain berumur 30 tahun tersebut telah diberi kesempatan tampil dalam 10 pertandingan Bundesliga musim ini. Namun hanya lima kali saja Muller bermain sebagai stater. Padahal kontribusi empat assist darinya tak bisa dipandang sebelah mata.
Itulah mengapa banyak pemberitaan belakangan ini yang mengatakan bahwa Muller berpeluang pindah ke Manchester United. Apalagi klub raksasa Inggris tersebut sedang membutuhkan tenaga baru di lini depan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Muller Urged to Move to Manchester United by Legend of Bayern Munchen
Nov 04 2019, 05:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bayern Munich legend, Bastian Schweinsteiger, seems concerned about the current situation of Thomas Muller. Therefore, he asked the Die Bavarians player to leave the Allianz Arena and meet the Manchester United proposal.
In recent weeks, Muller is often reported to be moving to Manchester United. Especially after he was forgotten by former Bayern Munich coach, Niko Kovac, on several occasions this season.
Indeed, the 30-year-old has been given the opportunity to appear in 10 Bundesliga matches this season. But only five times Muller played as a starter. Though the contribution of four assists from him cannot be underestimated.
That is why a lot of news lately says that Muller has the opportunity to move to Manchester United. Moreover, the English giants are in need of new power on the front lines.

Scroll down to read full information.
